, if your Leader Card is black and your opponent has 3 or more energy : At the end of a battle in which this card attacked, you can't play copies of this card for the turn; choose one-
・ Place up to 6 black Battle Cards with 30000 power from your Warp in your Drop Area.
・ Choose up to 1 ＜Dark Broly＞ card with an energy cost of 7 in your hand or Warp and play it on top of this card.

title: Dabura, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
: When this card is discarded from your hand by an opponent's skill, play this card from your Drop Area.
When this card is played, draw 2 cards.

title: Demon God Towa, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
When this card is played, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp. Your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand, sends it to their Warp, and draws 1 card.
, if your Leader Card is a ＜Towa＞ or ＜Mechikabura＞ card and you have 2 or more 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards in your Drop Area : Play this card from your hand, then place up to 2 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards from your deck in your Drop Area. Shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

title: Demon God Towa, Offering of the Dark Dragon Balls
skills_text: If your Leader Card is black : When this card is used in a combo, draw 1 card.

title: Demon God Putine, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a black ＜Mechikabura＞-only card : Negate the attack and play this card.
If it's your opponent's turn and you choose 1 card in your hand and place it at the bottom of your deck : When this card is played, your opponent can't attack for the turn unless they choose 2 cards in their hand and send them to their Warp each time.

title: Demon God Gravy, Ritual at Hand
skills_text: When this card attacks, your opponent may send 1 Battle Card from their Drop Area to their Warp. If they don't, this card gets +15000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

title: Dark King Mechikabura, Power Restored
skills_text:
If your opponent has 4 or more cards in their Warp : When this card is played, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards and send them to their owners' Warps, then choose up to 2 Battle Cards in your opponent's Warp with energy costs of 7 or less and different card names, negate their skills for the game, and play them in your Battle Area. You can't play non-black Battle Cards for the turn.
, if your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞-only card : Play this card from your hand.

title: Mechikabura, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
When this card is played, draw 1 card.
, if your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞-only card : Look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, play up to 1 black ＜Towa＞, ＜Shroom＞, or ＜Salsa＞ card with an energy cost of 4 and 15000 power or less among them, then shuffle your deck. You can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Shroom, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
If you have 2 or more energy : When this card attacks, your opponent chooses 1 Battle Card in their Drop Area and sends it to their Warp, then you choose up to 1 of their Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less and send it to its owner's Warp.
, if your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞-only card and you have 2 or more 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards in your Drop Area : Play this card from your hand, then place up to 2 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards from your deck in your Drop Area. Shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

title: Salsa, Ritual at Hand
skills_text:
When this card is played, your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand, sends it to their Warp, and draws 1 card.
When this card attacks, your opponent chooses 1 Battle Card in their Drop Area and sends it to their Warp; draw 1 card, and you can't activate the skills on copies of this card for the turn.
, if your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞-only card and you have 2 or more 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards in your Drop Area : Play this card from your hand, then place up to 2 《Dark Dragon Ball》 cards from your deck in your Drop Area. Shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

title: King Vegeta, a Kingdom Lost
skills_text:
When this card is played, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's hand or up to 1 of their Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp.
If this card is in Rest Mode : When your opponent attacks a Leader Card, your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and sends it to their Warp.
, if your opponent has 3 or more cards in their Warp : Play this card from your hand.

title: Dark Masked King, Pursuit of Power
skills_text:
If your opponent has 2 or more energy and 1 or more Battle Card in their Warp, this card gets +6000 power and can attack your opponent's Battle Cards in Active Mode.
, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in their Warp : Choose up to 1 black ＜King Vegeta : Xeno＞ card with an energy cost of 6 from your deck or hand, play it on top of this card in Active Mode, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

title: Dark Shenron, Wicked Wishmaster
skills_text:
This card can't attack.
If your Leader Card is black : When a Battle Card in your opponent's Drop Area is sent to their Warp by one of your skills, draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and send it to its owner's Warp.
If your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞ card and you choose 1 of your black Unison Cards with the skill : Place this card under the chosen card from your hand, then add a marker to that card. You can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Yearning for the Dark Dragon Balls
skills_text:
You can include up to 7 copies of this card in your deck.
This card gains 《Dark Dragon Ball》 in all areas.
If your Leader Card is a black 《Demon Realm Race》 card : Your opponent chooses 1 of their Battle Cards with an energy cost of 1 and sends it to its owner's Warp.
Choose 1 of your cards and it gets +5000 power for the battle.

title: Clash of the Masked Warriors
skills_text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Unison Cards : Your opponent may remove a marker from that card. If they don't, your Leader Card doesn't take damage from attacks by their Unison Cards with [Strike] skills for the battle.

title: Darkness Judgment
skills_text:
Negate the attack.
If your opponent has 3 or more cards in their Warp, you can activate this card's skill from your hand without paying its energy cost.
If your Leader Card is a ＜Mechikabura＞-only card and it's your opponent's turn : Choose 1 of your cards and it gets +5000 power for the turn.

title: Syn Shenron, Corrupted by the Darkness
skills_text:
This card is also treated as black in all areas.
If this card would be removed from a Battle Area, remove it from the game instead.
: At the end of a battle in which this card is used in a combo from your hand, play this card from your Drop Area. If you do, choose any number of your opponent's Leader Cards, Battle Cards, and Unison Cards equal to or less than their current energy, ignoring , and switch them to Rest Mode.
: This card gains and for the turn.

title: SS3 Gohanks, Interdimensional Warrior
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
When this card is played, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards, ignoring , and they get -25000 power for the turn.
When your opponent attacks with a Battle Card, you may choose it and it gets -25000 power for the turn.
This card gets +15000 power and for the turn, and at the end of the turn, switch this card to Active Mode.

title: Robelu, Demigra's Secretary
skills_text:
If this card would be removed from a Battle Area, remove it from the game instead.
If you have 4 or more energy : When this card is played using , play up to 2 Battle Cards with different card names, energy costs of 6 or less, and the skill from your Warp.
Choose 1 card in your Battle Area with the skill and place it in its owner's Drop Area : When one of your opponent's cards attacks, negate the attack.
